name: Code-Wraith
description: Ghosts in the machine, Code-Wraiths manipulate the data streams that are the lifeblood of NeoCity. They dismantle corporate firewalls and bend the net to the Vipers' will.

name: Chrome-Reaper
description: The brutal enforcers of the Vipers. Part flesh, part steel, all business. They are the frontline in any turf war, masters of intimidation and close-quarters combat.

name: Whisper-Broker
description: Information is power, and Whisper-Brokers are the power plant. They trade in secrets, weapons, and influence, connecting the Vipers to the rest of the underworld.

name: Scrap-Savant
description: Masters of hardware and improvisation. Scrap-Savants can turn a pile of junk into a lethal drone or a bypass a state-of-the-art mag-lock with a paperclip and a prayer.
